column1: Smoque BBQ////I love this place ! I have been here twice! Once in 2010! Another visit was today September
column3: 2015 ! I went with my dad for an early dinner. He had the baby back ribs platter with beans
column5: and slaw ! I had the pulled pork platter with Mac n cheese
column7: and slaw! Everything was delicious !! We ordered some peach cobbler and a couple pieces of cornbread for the trip home ! We were even able to meet one of the owners Barry and got a picture with Barry and "Guy" from Triple D in the background ! If you are ever in Chicago
column8: I recommend you stop here for some great bbq! This place has legit yummy bbq!
